website_summaries.verdict: Supercompact, affordable, and with fast performance, the Clear Spot Voyager would be a great mobile hot-spot device for those who live and travel within Clear's 4G coverage.
pros: The tiny Clear Spot Voyager can provide Internet access to up to eight Wi-Fi devices at a time with fast 4G connection speeds, has good battery life, and comes with affordable unlimited data plans
The device immediately works as an Internet source when connected to a non-Wi-Fi computer
cons: The Clear Spot Voyager doesn't support 3G, Wireless-N, text messaging, and doesn't have a clear battery life gauge
The mobile hot spot doesn't go into sleep mode, so the battery runs down relatively fast even when there are no connected clients

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Better than my original model
customer_reviews.text: I bought a clear device when the company was going live about two years ago maybe three. I dropped my device and it never worked again very well. It was hard to find signals so I had to place it in weird spots. So after much stubborness of having to buy a new one I finally broke down and did just that. Well I can get signals in the most closed spaces so that tells me it has a strong antenna to capture signals. It's cute and I love the lights on it. It's worth the buy and much cheaper than buying it from the clear retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Karim Jimerson

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the area that I am in, very surprised. Wifi range is decent, I can use it in the next room over, a good 20 feet away with one wall separating it. Setup is a breeze, and the device gets four stars because it is beautiful..... battery might not last all that long but you can simply use a USB port of any kind to give it juice. It is very small and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Interstellar

customer_reviews.title: product
customer_reviews.text: It's only ok because it doesn't hold a charge for very long. I have charged it while it was not in use and the green light that tells me it's completely charged appeared. I would use it completely charged and within a few hours the battery was getting low.
customer_reviews.author: D P.

customer_reviews.title: Clear Wireless Hotspot...no frills and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Hard to come by product...since Sprint has bought them out. Loved Clear for their simple no contract service. And it was affordable...for both the wireless hotspot and monthly service charge. May never be this good or simple again.
customer_reviews.author: Keiko

customer_reviews.title: Works well, capability to pick 4G signal is lower than desktop devices
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well. Please note that if you signal is on lower side - desktop devices from Clear pick signal much better. I see better speed and more reliable connection in the same spot with Clear desktop modems than with this device. In spots where desktop could barely pick a signal and work OK - this portable cannot pick the signal and connect.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tells but so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I both this because my first Clear device failed suddenly quit. Clear was useless at helping me fix the issue and troubleshoot, the customer service was not helpful. I had to resort to purchasing a new device... However, this new device came quick and setting it up was simple and fast. I have used it around Baltimore and in NYC. It even catches signal when I was moving on the LIRR from Long Island to Manhattan! The signal is spotty in rural areas between states (doesnt bother me, of course the signal will be bad!) but it works very well in major cities and I'm happy so far. Good battery life too!
customer_reviews.author: Yale

customer_reviews.title: I like the unlimited
customer_reviews.text: best device for unlimited data; however, it's a pain in the but to get it set up and find an area where it can catch a signal
customer_reviews.author: Brandon lancaster

customer_reviews.title: The best portable wifi hotspot ever
customer_reviews.text: This handy little gadget is reliable ! And because of it, I have made my iPad into a telephone allowing me to use VoIP and save minutes on a cheap phone plan. It's really one of the best purchases I've made in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Costa

customer_reviews.title: clearspot voyager
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, had no problems with it. it does not over heat like the ones do. Very very good product

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: You should also add the fact that half the world ClearSPOT has no coverage area for me to connect...a waste of time and money to return it because there is no coverage where I live...in new york.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I currently travel around and need reliable wifi on the go. This was a great purchase though sometimes the connection randomly drops, however rarely. I definately recommend buying this.

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Really like this i'm satisfy with my clear spot I can take it anywhere n it's fast internet......I Totally recommend it!!

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful tool  for business
customer_reviews.text: It's cool. I took it with me anywhere I go, I make business transaction on the go, check my email, watch movies from amazon. It works with all my devices and laptop. Though you need to call clear or go online to pay for connection. But it works for me, I don't need to wait till when I get home or look for free wifi to do my business. I charge it in my car, I put it in my pocket, always online.
customer_reviews.author: OSUNTAN LAWRENCE B.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE -  Do NOT waste your $$$
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I purchased this devise. Well, after following the simple instructions, I could not connect. Called into customer service to troubleshoot. I was told that I was in a great service area and to try and place device by window. After over an hour on the phone, I STILL could not get a signal; so at last, I gave up. While they were trying to "fix" my signal issue, they kept trying to sell me other products/services...are you kidding me? Don't waster your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: nofussmama

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It has great service for a low monthly price. I'm extremely pleased with my product. I get great service anywhere....no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not up to my expectation.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't. What I thought it would do it didn't . Anywhere I go with it I do not receive Internet .
customer_reviews.author: Nkam Ngesang

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install priced right and very small. Works great. Still needing to test it on the road. Overall very happy.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: wound up basically throwing it away as Clear vacated Illinois a month after I purchased it
customer_reviews.author: VernaT6

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I didn't set it up properly, but it is VERY slow,so I had to switch back to my Time Warner set up. Too bad for me, and I am going to stop the Clear Service, too bad for them.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory E. Walker

customer_reviews.title: The router is great!  But the coverage is another thing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Clear after hearing a lot of hype. The router itself is great! The coverage is not that great (it is not as advertised). But when your are connected there is no faster service. This thing works. Just need more coverage. 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sound man

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: It may not work in your area!
customer_reviews.text: I read rave reviews on the product, yet it does not work in the area in which I live. The only way I discovered this was when I opened the paperwork inside the box and it showed which geographic areas would/would not support this particular hot spot. I will be returning mine because of this. I just wish that a graphic were included with the product photos so that people won't purchase it and not be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: I don, t have a headline.
customer_reviews.text: It would not work in our area. I do not recommend it unless you are assured it will work in your location.
customer_reviews.author: Mary ling

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I actually use the CLEAR spot for my home internet. I switched it from the CLEAR USB. It can be mobile internet, which yes i have taken it with me and I was pleased how well it worked without being plugged in. I have simple internet needs, but i do stream and it streams fine. For me it was a HUGE upgrade from the CLEAR USB i previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: Noblkkat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hockey puck!
customer_reviews.text: Got this unit for free with all my Bing searches discounts. I still use it today! Sometimes it has to be reset, but other than that it's a good little unit. It's especially nice to be able to unplug it and take it with me wherever I go!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Product is practically indispensable to me even as I respond to this survey....Thanks very much, Amazon.com Team!
customer_reviews.text: This small but powerful, portable product has literally put me in charge and ahead as far as internet connection/service is concerned! I cannot not imagine parting with for even a couple of minutes to anyone, at least for now. I don't know how to thank the Amazon.com team enough.....I can only say THANK YUO all (again) for a job well done! You're second to none - in my estimation! Mustapha M Sama
customer_reviews.author: Mustapha M. Sama

customer_reviews.title: this little guy is the bomb
customer_reviews.text: This thing right here is the best I have the spot voyage device its so simple n compact I bring it with me wherever I go I just have it in my pocket its smaller than my wallet amazing

customer_reviews.title: Decent reception and portable but short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn't seem to last long, a few hours maybe. Reception range is average for this type of device. Extremely portable - lightweight and small.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best 4G unlimited & really easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: I heard Clear was bought by Sprint, but Clear is still in activating new customers. This device was really easy to setup. It works great. I connected my laptop & started Internet Explorer. I was directed to Clear's setup page & I created an account in only 5 minutes. The whole process was really simple, practically anyone can do it.

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize they want any extra fifty buck a month to use it and they say it's hard to talk to the people as well but I never tried yet

customer_reviews.title: THE INTERNET LEADER FOR SURE!
customer_reviews.text: whats to say this is the ABSOLUTE BEST! Clear internet has no competition it isd THE PRICE LEADER and no other service can hold a candle next to it, it has all the attributes and capabilities of the high cost big names but at 1/3 the price! NOBODY DOES IT BETTER! Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Clear Device
customer_reviews.text: Even though they say the service sucks in my area it still seem to do what I need it to do. I also satisfied with the fact that I can take it on the go and have unlimited internet.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not speedy and hit or miss coverage. The only redeeming features is unlimited data and no contract.

customer_reviews.title: had to send it back
customer_reviews.text: although the ad said "nation wide service"...there is no service in this area!! we sent this back right after receiving it!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, better than described.
customer_reviews.text: The Voyager Clear Spot hotspot is an excellent product. While the description said it had a 6hr battery life, it is more like 8+hrs. The signal sensitivity is excellent - where my old hotspot had a 'yellow' (marginal) signal, this hotspot has a 'green' (excellent) signal. Would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: breeny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, best price for high speed internet without a contract. Very portable and the charge lasts forever. Very happy with results.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment made ever.  Highly recommend to anyone

customer_reviews.author: Juan

product_meta.title: CLEAR Spot Voyager IFM-910CW 4G Wireless Hotspot
product_meta.description: The CLEAR IFM-910CW Spot Voyager utilizes 802.11 b/g wireless standards that can support up to eight Wi-Fi enabled devices for fast and reliable Internet access. This amazing wireless access point includes advanced security protocols such as WEP, WPA, and WPA2 to prevent unauthorized use of your connection. Plus, the CLEAR IFM-910CW Spot Voyager runs on a rechargeable battery that can last over 6 hours of continuous use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars97 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Price Includes First Month and Activation, First month of unlimited service may change to $39.99 for 40GB if you live in states that have an extension coverage.
